name: Ambience, Wind Chimes, B.wav
description: My "Wind Chimes, A.wav" sound played four times at different speeds and pitches, then combined together for this glimmering ambience. As four sounds were combined the noise level was particularly high, though it quite ironically makes it sound like there is wind blowing in the background which I thought added a nice touch. This sound is not in the public domain. Please attribute/credit the sound if you use it. If you would prefer to not have to give attribution, then take a look at the attribution-free license. name: Dark Ambience
description: A creepy dark ambience sound made from an old recording of a big tree waving in harsh wind. I gave it a lot of reverb and roomtone and then applied a vocoder which gave it a kind of rumbling effect with a lot of bass. HEY! Did you find my sound useful? Consider supporting my work by donating a dollar or two through this link: paypal.me/lieberkind It won't take long, it's super easy (via PayPal) and you'll totally make my day! ;) Thank you!

name: Arctic
description:
I had some midi files that I had made with a free app for Symbian OS (Music Box). I converted them to wave files using Format Factory, another free app for Windows. I then synthesized a wind sound effect by generating white noise and applying some effects to it. I used the free demo version of a VST plug-in, Muze, to get the reverb effect. I also applied some volume fluctuation/tremolo effect to the tune that I made with the wave files.
I request that you inform me of your purpose if you wish to use this sound for commercial purposes.

name: Thunderstorm.WAV
description: It is that time of year again: summer wind thunder rain. The first one I was able to record this year. Sony PCM M10 recorder, Clippy omni microphones and a FEL preamp was the gear used. Will sound different in wintertime.

name: Thunder in the city 200626_0190.ogg
description: It was a hot summer day in June and now thick thunderclouds are hanging over the city that just don't seem to be moving. It is constantly, low level, rumbling. A baby woke up from it. The ice cream man, always playing the same tune on his truck, tries to sell some ice creams quickly, but then it starts to rain and the wind blows. The customers go home quickly. After a while every now and then a large raindrop falls on the microphones and that gives a nice ticking sound. Now listening back it gives the experience that I am in the rain myself. Eventually I move the equipment carefully so as not to disturb the sound recording too much. Slowly but surely the storm moves further north. It becomes quiet. Date/time: June 26th 2020, 7:35 -9:01 pm Weather: 30.5-21.1c, thunder clouds, wind changing in all directions, 1008 hPa and droppig, humidity high. Location; Kruiskamp, ‘s-Hertogenbosch (Den Bosch), Noord-Brabant, Netherlands (Holland), Europe. GPS Gear chain: Sennheiser mkh30/50 MS, in Rycote cyclone small, windjammer > Sound Devices 302 >Tascam dr-100 Mk2. Decoded Mid-side to STEREO. If any of these sounds have been of help, and you are feeling charitable, please do consider donating to Freesound to help keep the site running (a link is also on the home page). Any donations are greatly appreciated! YOU ALWAYS HAVE TO CREDIT/ATTRIBUTE me (klankbeeld) and freesound.org in your work if you use this sound. Please do it like this if possible: https://freesound.org/people/klankbeeld/ Thank you. This sound may NOT be used in (royalty free) stock material. Don't put my raw sounds/files on youtube or anywhere else. You can use them in creative way as a part of art-form, but not "re-distribute" as (royalty free) stock material. Thank you.

name: Thunder ambience.wav
description: This sound was made by me blowing into the microphone  for a  30 seconds. the when I edited it I cut out all the parts in the track where I took another breath of air. And finally I added a low Pass EQ filter, so that I could create that thunder sound. Or it can even be a sand storm ambiance within a dessert terrain.

name: Thunder Rush. 28 July 2021.wav
description: Heavy rain followed by a blast of thunder that 'rushes' away and fades. I've left enough room for an audio edit to fit your project. Enjoy. On playback, there seems to be a very high pitched 'tick' in places. This is NOT part of the original recording and is NOT included when 'Downloaded'. I think this must be a slight fault on the web site.

name: Disney's Big Thunder Mountain Railroad, A.wav
description: An on-ride recording of Disney's "Big Thunder Mountain Railroad" ride at Disney's "Magic Kingdom". I have cut out all the segments of the ride that had sound designed elements (e.g. bats squeaking in the cave, sounds of goats, and sounds of mining operations etc.). What's left are the mechanical sounds and reactions of the people on the ride. This sound is not in the public domain. Please attribute/credit the sound if you use it. name: Lightning strikes with rainy ambience.wav
description:
I recorded this rainy ambience from my balcony at around 2:00 am. This place is located on the outskirts of Delhi, India. Although it never happens that it rains in winter, but sometimes it does. The rain started at 1:00am and continued till around 6:00am.


Best Strike @ 05:30

Location : Sonipat, Haryana, India

Equipment : Zoom H1n

Do not hesitate
Feel free to use !!

------------------------------------------

बारिश के इस माहौल को मैंने रात के 2 बजे अपनी बालकनी से रिकॉर्ड किया।  यह जगह दिल्ली, भारत के बाहरी इलाके में स्थित है।  हालांकि ऐसा कभी नहीं होता है कि सर्दियों में बारिश हो, लेकिन कभी-कभी ऐसा हो जाता है।  बारिश सुबह के एक बजे शुरू हुई और सुबह छह बजे तक जारी रही।


 संकोच न करें
 उपयोग करने के लिए स्वतंत्र महसूस करें !!

The sound is provided you without any post processing (except the removal of some beginning / ending clicks). Format : Stereo .wav files, 44.1khz, 16 bit.

name: Hail and Rain
description:
Hail and rain sound effect was created by recording bird seed being thrown onto paper and a carpet.

Sound was recorded using Zoom H6 recorder, the microphone that was used was the interchangeable input capsule X/Y microphone, that comes with the recorder. Reaper was used to remove some noise reduction was done using ReaFir and Reacomp was used to compress the sound.

A storm, first you can hear hail transitioning to just rain, some thunder in the background.
You can listen the water hitting hard ground. Concrete.

name: Rain and Hail Methow Valley
description: An intense storm rolled through the Methow Valley this afternoon, and I recorded this with a Blue Yeti mic connected directly to my MacAir in Garage Band. There's rain, hail, thunder, and wind.

name: StormHail.wav
description: A recording of pea sized hail hitting windows facing south in a late night mid April thunder storm. Recorded inside on an ironing board with a Zoom H1 Handy Recorder. No alteration.

name: Hail Comes In.wav
description:
Hail Comes In
This was a strange storm. Tons of lightning, but only distant thunder. The rain was nearly falling vertically.

Audio description: May 20, 2014. Hail comes in and pounds a deck outside for about a minute or so, then fades and raindrops themselves take prominence. The wind picks up, so you can hear wind chimes going at it and some deep rolling thunder far in the background. If you’ve experienced high winds before, it will probably sound scary to you at volume.

Recorded with a TASCAM DR-05 with a dead cat and no low cut. I got the mics as close to an open window as I could without being ridiculous. Cropped and faded in and out in audacity. No other modifications, so you’ll have to normalize it and equalize to your liking. 

Might be useful as a “heavy rain” sound, since the hail kind of sounds like that anyway.

name: Room tone with hail falling outside
description: Big thunder around 0:56. Closed windows - room tone with rain and hail outside. Recorded with Zoom H5's internal XY mics.

name: Rain and hail fall on ground outside
description: Small hail falling outside in the back yard, mixed with rain drops. Recorded with Zoom H5's internal XY mics.

name: HAIL ON TRUCK.mp3
description: I was sitting on a local road having some coffee and the hail really started coming down. Recorded with my Yamaha Pocketrak. Edited with Sony Vegas and one track duplication. Please comment on what you will use it for. Thanks.   :^)

name: Rain and Hail sounds.wav
description: A rain and hail storm recorded through my window in my backyard. Sounds are impacts with the ground and pings from a nearby metal fence. Recorded with an AT2020 mic. I recorded this for people to be able to freely use this in any type of production they want.

name: Hail Stones hitting tin
description:
Recorded using a pair of Rode lavalier microphones from a loft window. The hail stones were hitting the metal flashing (I think that it what it is called) around the window. Loved the rhythm and hypnotic nature of this. 

if you use this recording, please let me know as I'd love to hear how it is used.

name: Very large hail 2012-10-26.wav
description: We had a great hail shower, with hail as big as a thumbnail. I was amazed, and ran inside to fetch my Zoom H2 once more. When the hail shower slows down, the near by rooster decides to give notice of its presence.
